roleset.name: add text to pictures, subtitle
roleset.note: CAPTION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'caption' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from caption.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: To top it off, you captioned the graph showing the average number of months in a job search as ``Time Off.''
example.arg: the graph showing the average number of months in a job search
